aboutUs.title: About Us | Clover Venezuela
aboutUs.metaDescription: We are more than a service provider, we are a commercial ally concerned with providing solutions that maximize your company's cost-benefit ratio. We create possibilities that move.

hero.subtitle: About Us
hero.title: +Experience +Commitment
hero.description: We are more than a service provider, we are a commercial ally concerned with providing solutions that maximize your company's cost-benefit ratio.

intro.title: We create possibilities that move
intro.lead: With more than 55 years of experience in the Venezuelan market, Clover Internacional has established itself as a leader in integral 3PL logistics solutions. Our track record supports us as a strategic ally for national and international companies.
intro.description: We are dedicated to providing logistics services that go beyond simple goods transportation. We understand that each client has unique needs, so we develop customized solutions that optimize your supply chain.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: More than five decades building trust.

1964.title: Foundation
1964.description: We began operations in Venezuela as freight agents with a vision for the future.

1980.title: Expansion
1980.description: We expanded our services to land transportation and storage.

2000.title: Modernization
2000.description: We implemented cutting-edge technology for cargo management and tracking.

today.title: 3PL Leaders
today.description: We are leaders in integral logistics with national and international coverage.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide each of our actions.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We commit to each client to deliver results that exceed their expectations.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: We believe in collaboration as the foundation for achieving common goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly seek new ways to improve our services and processes.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: We respect agreed-upon times because we know your business doesn't wait.

customs.title: Customs Services in Venezuela | Clover Venezuela
customs.metaDescription: Expert customs management in Venezuela. Tariff classification, customs valuation, special regimes and comprehensive advisory for import and export.

hero.subtitle: Customs Services
hero.title: +Solutions for you
hero.description: We help you with your customs procedures so you can stay focused on your priorities.

intro.title: +Close +Effective management
intro.lead: We manage your customs processes expeditiously and efficiently; so that your merchandise can continue through the supply chain stages without setbacks or additional expenses.
intro.description: We are experts in customs regimes capable of solving your needs through +innovative and comprehensive solutions that result in expeditious nationalization.

services.title: Customs Services
services.subtitle: We offer a complete range of services to facilitate your foreign trade operations.

tariffClassification.title: Tariff Classification and Customs Valuation
tariffClassification.description: We correctly determine the tariff heading of your merchandise and its customs value to avoid tax contingencies.

customsRepresentation.title: Customs Representation
customsRepresentation.description: We represent your interests and resolve discrepancies with customs authorities with professionalism and experience.

customsConsulting.title: Customs Consulting
customsConsulting.description: Expert advisory on import, export, transit and current customs regulations in Venezuela.

currentTariff.title: Current Customs Tariff
currentTariff.description: Correct application of the customs tariff and other applicable laws in customs matters for your operation.

specialRegimes.title: Special Regimes
specialRegimes.description: Request and processing of liberation, suspension and other special customs regimes according to your needs.

expertise.title: We offer you the best time along with the best costs
expertise.description: Our experience allows us to identify the best options for your operation, optimizing nationalization times and reducing operational costs without compromising regulatory compliance.

warehouse.title: Warehouse in Venezuela | Clover Venezuela
warehouse.metaDescription: Merchandise storage in Venezuela. Both for distribution and custody. We store all types of products: from refrigerated to physical documents.

hero.subtitle: Warehouse
hero.title: +We safeguard realities
hero.description: We secure your merchandise in optimal conditions according to your distribution or custody needs.

intro.title: Warehouse services in Venezuela
intro.lead: We offer comprehensive solutions in storage logistics operations. Our service is ideal for all types of cargo and merchandise. We have the capacity to handle both distribution and custody.
intro.description: We provide you with the best equipment, modern facilities and updated systems to guarantee the security and efficient handling of your assets.

services.title: Storage Solutions
services.subtitle: We adapt our capabilities to your needs in a +smart and personalized way.

pickingPacking.title: Picking & Packing
pickingPacking.description: Precise product selection and packaging to optimize distribution and reduce delivery times.

crossDocking.title: Cross Docking
crossDocking.description: Cargo consolidation and deconsolidation for direct distribution without prolonged storage.

coldChain.title: Cold Chain
coldChain.description: Maintenance and distribution of refrigerated and frozen products guaranteeing cold chain continuity.

maquilas.title: Maquilas
maquilas.description: Labeling, repackaging and product preparation services according to client specifications.

inventoryManagement.title: Inventory Management
inventoryManagement.description: Real-time inventory control and management with state-of-the-art technology.

secureCustody.title: Secure Custody
secureCustody.description: Secure merchandise storage with 24-hour surveillance systems and access control.

cta.title: Need storage for your merchandise?
cta.description: Contact us and learn about our personalized storage solutions.

logisticsIntegral.title: Integral Logistics Venezuela | Clover Venezuela - 3PL
logisticsIntegral.metaDescription: Integral 3PL logistics solutions in Venezuela. More than 55 years of experience in transportation, storage, customs and international cargo.

hero.subtitle: Integral Logistics
hero.title: +Experience by your side
hero.description: We handle all the complexity of your cargo with simplicity through a single company.

intro.title: We move + possibilities
intro.lead: We guarantee control of your cargo from origin to final destination. We ensure technological and comprehensive management of your merchandise through modern storage systems and our state-of-the-art technological infrastructure.
intro.description1: For merchandise of any type, size or weight, we provide a full range of maritime (FCL and LCL), air and land services, from or to anywhere in the world.
intro.description2: We have strategic alliances with different global logistics companies. This allows us to provide excellent cost-benefit ratio and itineraries according to your needs.

capabilities.title: World-class 3PL capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: We have the capacity to freight cargo of any size and weight, including oversized, indivisible and extra heavy cargo.

doorToDoor.title: Door-to-Door Insurance
doorToDoor.description: Complete protection of your merchandise throughout the journey from origin to final destination.

oversizedCargo.title: Oversized Cargo
oversizedCargo.description: Experience in handling indivisible, extra heavy and special dimension cargo.

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Maritime, air and land services from or to anywhere in the world.

hazardousMaterials.title: Hazardous Materials
hazardousMaterials.description: Certification and experience in handling hazardous materials according to international regulations.

handCarrier.title: Air Hand Carrier
handCarrier.description: Dedicated courier service for urgent and high-value shipments.

technology.title: Cutting-edge Technology
technology.description: Real-time tracking and inventory management systems for total control of your supply chain.

experience.title: Our experience, your guarantee
experience.lead: Our knowledge and expertise in cargo logistics management guarantee the efficiency of our solutions for your entire supply chain.
experience.description: Our services are designed to provide solutions that help you maximize both the effectiveness and efficiency of your company's supply chain. We have more than 55 years of operations in Venezuela offering quality and personalized service according to your needs.

cta.title: Ready to optimize your supply chain?
cta.description: Contact us and discover how our 3PL solutions can transform your logistics.

landTransport.title: Land Transport in Venezuela | Clover Venezuela
landTransport.metaDescription: Secure land transport service in Venezuela. National distribution with modern fleet and specialized security systems for your merchandise.

hero.subtitle: Land Transport
hero.title: +Safe +Fast +Expert
hero.description: Secure land transport in Venezuela with the most experience and specialized fleet.

intro.title: +Care on wheels
intro.lead: Our land transport service in Venezuela has a solid distribution platform, infrastructure and resource innovation.
intro.description: Additionally, our fleet has specialized security systems for your safety throughout the journey. We are able to handle all procedures by integrating your processes with our integrated logistics.

features.title: Our Service Features
features.subtitle: We offer a complete land transport solution with the best guarantees.

guaranteedSecurity.title: Guaranteed Security
guaranteedSecurity.description: Specialized security systems and continuous surveillance throughout your merchandise's journey.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: 24-hour GPS monitoring to know the exact location of your cargo at any time.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: Delivery time compliance with optimized route and resource planning.

modernFleet.title: Modern Fleet
modernFleet.description: Vehicles in optimal condition with capacity for different types and volumes of cargo.

cargoInsurance.title: Cargo Insurance
cargoInsurance.description: Complete protection of your merchandise with coverage throughout the journey.

integratedLogistics.title: Integrated Logistics
integratedLogistics.description: Coordination with our warehouse and customs services for a complete solution.

coverage.title: National Coverage
coverage.lead: We reach every corner of Venezuela with our land distribution network. From major cities to industrial and commercial areas throughout the country.

cta.title: Need to transport your merchandise?
cta.description: Contact us and get a personalized quote for your land distribution.

internationalCargo.title: International Cargo | Clover Venezuela
internationalCargo.metaDescription: We transport merchandise of any size by air, sea or land from and to anywhere in the world through strategic alliances established from Venezuela.

hero.subtitle: International Cargo
hero.title: +Global connections
hero.description: We transport merchandise of any size by air, sea or land from and to anywhere in the world.

intro.title: We connect Venezuela with the world
intro.lead: For merchandise of any type, size or weight, we provide a full range of maritime (FCL and LCL), air and land services, from or to anywhere in the world.
intro.description: We have strategic alliances with different global logistics companies. This allows us to provide excellent cost-benefit ratio and itineraries according to your needs.

services.title: Cargo Modalities
services.subtitle: We offer multiple international transport options adapted to your needs.

fcl.title: FCL Maritime Cargo
fcl.description: Full container for large merchandise volumes. Maximum control and security of your cargo.

lcl.title: LCL Maritime Cargo
lcl.description: Cargo consolidation for smaller volumes. Share container and optimize costs.

air.title: Air Cargo
air.description: Fast transport for urgent shipments or high-value merchandise.

capabilities.title: Special Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: We have experience handling all types of cargo.

oversized.title: Oversized Cargo
oversized.description: Handling of special dimension merchandise and indivisible loads.

hazardous.title: Hazardous Materials
hazardous.description: Certification and experience in handling hazardous materials according to regulations.

insurance.title: Cargo Insurance
insurance.description: Complete door-to-door protection throughout the international journey.

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: Analysis of your needs and personalized proposal.

coordination.title: Coordination
coordination.description: Document management and coordination with suppliers.

shipment.title: Shipment
shipment.description: Collection and shipment of your merchandise at origin.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Nationalization and delivery at final destination.

cta.title: Ready to import or export?
cta.description: Contact us and get a quote for your international cargo.
